mapper.select:
SELECT u.id, u.msg_id AS fId, IF (u.material_id = 0,'系统消息','公告') title, u.gmt_create AS time, u.msg_type AS msgType, (case when u.sender_type = 0 then 'DEFAULT' when u.sender_type = 1 then s1.avatar when u.sender_type = 2 then s2.avatar when u.sender_type = 3 then s3.avatar end) avatar, u.gmt_update , u.material_id, (select cc.id from cms_content cc where cc.material_id=u.material_id and cc.is_material_entry=1) as cmsid, u.is_read+'' is_read, u.sender_id FROM user_message u LEFT JOIN pmph_user s1 ON u.sender_id = s1.id AND u.sender_type = 1 LEFT JOIN writer_user s2 ON u.sender_id = s2.id AND u.sender_type = 2 LEFT JOIN org_user s3 ON u.sender_id = s3.id AND u.sender_type = 3 WHERE u.is_withdraw = 0 AND u.is_deleted = 0 AND u.receiver_id = #{userId} AND u.receiver_type=2 AND msg_type IN (0, 1)
AND u.material_id !=0
AND u.material_id =0
ORDER BY u.gmt_create DESC
limit #{startPara},8

select count(*) from( select u.id from user_message u WHERE u.is_withdraw = 0 AND u.receiver_id = #{userId} AND msg_type IN (0, 1) AND u.is_deleted = 0
AND u.material_id !=0
AND u.material_id =0
)t

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT n.id,n.material_id,n.title,n.gmt_create,4 FROM (SELECT t.* FROM cms_content t LEFT JOIN material b ON t.material_id =b.id WHERE t.category_id=3 AND t.material_id IS NOT NULL AND t.material_id >0 AND b.is_public <> 0 AND t.auth_status=2 AND t.is_deleted=0 AND t.is_published=1 UNION SELECT t.* FROM cms_content t LEFT JOIN material b ON t.material_id =b.id LEFT JOIN material_org u ON b.id=u.material_id LEFT JOIN writer_user p ON p.org_id=u.org_id WHERE t.category_id=3 AND t.material_id IS NOT NULL AND t.material_id >0 AND b.is_public = 0 AND t.auth_status=2 AND t.is_deleted=0 AND t.is_published=1 AND p.id=#{userId}) n )t
